data.actual_result: No popups show up on your profile
data.expected_result: The popups "Congrats, you played yourself, oh wait you can't" and "Listen along with someone else, not yourself" appear
data.short_description: Spotify popups on own profile are missing
data.steps_to_repro: - Start playing Spotify - Open up your profile - Scroll over the "Play on Spotify" and "Listen Along" options
